mapper.select:
select * from p10_assets_re where p10_assets_re.del_flag = 0 and p10_assets_re.casee_id is not null
AND p10_assets_re.project_id = #{query.projectId}
AND p10_assets.assets_name like concat('%',#{query.assetsName},'%')
AND p10_assets.owner like concat('%',#{query.owner},'%')
AND p10_assets.account_number like concat('%',#{query.accountNumber},'%')
AND json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, '$.AssetsSeizure.seizureExpiryDate' ) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

select p10_assets_re.*,p10_assets.assets_name,p10_assets.assets_type,p10_assets.`owner`,p10_assets.account_number,p10_address.province,p10_address.city,p10_address.area,p10_address.information_address,p10_address.`code`,p10_address.address_id from p10_assets_re left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id = p10_assets.assets_id and p10_address.type = 4 where p10_assets_re.del_flag = 0 and p10_assets_re.assets_re_id = #{assetsReId}

select p10_assets_re.*,p10_assets.assets_name,p10_assets.assets_type,p10_assets.`owner`,p10_assets.account_number,p10_address.province,p10_address.city,p10_address.area,p10_address.information_address,p10_address.`code`,p10_address.address_id from p10_assets_re left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id = p10_assets.assets_id and p10_address.type = 4 where p10_assets_re.del_flag = 0 and p10_assets_re.assets_re_id = #{assetsReId}

select * from p10_assets_re left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_assets_re.project_id left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id = p10_assets_re.casee_id left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id = p10_assets.assets_id and p10_address.type = 4 where p10_assets_re.del_flag = 0 and p10_assets_re.casee_id is not null and p10_project.project_type = 200
and p10_project.ins_id = #{login.insId}
and p10_project.outles_id = #{login.outlesId}
AND (p10_project.company_code like concat('%',#{query.caseeNumber},'%') or p10_casee.casee_number like concat('%',#{query.caseeNumber},'%'))
AND p10_assets.assets_name like concat('%',#{query.assetsName},'%')
AND p10_assets.owner like concat('%',#{query.owner},'%')
AND p10_assets.account_number like concat('%',#{query.accountNumber},'%')
AND json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, '$.AssetsSeizure.seizureExpiryDate' ) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

select * from p10_assets_re left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id where p10_assets_re.project_id = #{projectId}
AND p10_assets.assets_name like concat('%',#{assetsName},'%')

SELECT p10_assets_re.*,p10_assets.assets_name,p10_assets.assets_type,p10_assets.`owner`,p10_assets.account_number,p10_address.province,p10_address.city,p10_address.area,p10_address.information_address,p10_address.`code`,p10_address.address_id,p10_auction_assets_re.auction_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT p10_assets_re.* FROM ( SELECT p10_assets_re.* FROM p10_auction_assets_re LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p10_auction_assets_re.auction_id FROM p10_assets_re LEFT JOIN p10_auction_assets_re ON p10_auction_assets_re.assets_re_id = p10_assets_re.assets_re_id WHERE p10_assets_re.project_id = #{projectId} AND p10_assets_re.casee_id = #{caseeId} AND p10_assets_re.assets_id = #{assetsId} ) p10_auction ON p10_auction.auction_id = p10_auction_assets_re.auction_id LEFT JOIN p10_assets_re ON p10_assets_re.assets_re_id = p10_auction_assets_re.assets_re_id WHERE p10_auction.auction_id IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT * FROM p10_assets_re WHERE p10_assets_re.project_id = #{projectId} AND p10_assets_re.`status` = 100 ) p10_assets_re ) p10_assets_re LEFT JOIN p10_auction_assets_re ON p10_auction_assets_re.assets_re_id = p10_assets_re.assets_re_id left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id = p10_assets.assets_id and p10_address.type = 4

select p10_assets_re.*,p10_target.target_id as assetsTargetId from p10_assets_re left join p10_target on p10_target.goal_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id and p10_assets_re.casee_id = p10_target.casee_id and p10_assets_re.project_id = p10_target.project_id and p10_target.goal_type = 20001 where p10_assets_re.del_flag = 0 and p10_assets_re.assets_re_id = #{assetsReId}
